body.name: Ross-Simons Italian Murano Glass Heart Drop Earrings in 18kt Gold Over Sterling
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 14 hrs 45 mins.
features: ITALIAN MURANO GLASS AND 18KT GOLD OVER STERLING — Italian multicolored Murano glass heart bead drop earrings in 18kt gold over sterling. Heart-shaped royal blue, light blue, green, gold and bronze foil Murano glass beads. Polished finish. 1 1/2 in. hanging length, 5/8 in. wide. Earwire backings. Murano glass beads are unique and may vary.
THE FINISHING TOUCH — With their lovely design, these Murano glass earrings add a feminine accent to any style. Pair them with your casual or formal attire.

MADE IN ITALY — Italian fine jewelry stands out for its unparalleled style and craftsmanship. Wear these luxurious earrings, knowing they have been crafted to the highest quality standards in the world.

THE PERFECT GIFT FOR HER — These are the ideal gift for your sister, daughter, mom, wife, niece, aunt, best friend, girlfriend — or yourself! Whether she prefers modern or traditional jewelry, Ross-Simons has a wide selection of bracelets, earrings, necklaces and rings to choose from.

GIFT BOX INCLUDED — Ross-Simons jewelry arrives beautifully packaged in a gift box, ready to delight for any occasion, including birthdays, Christmas, Mother’s Day, anniversaries, Valentine’s Day, weddings, graduations and much more!
body.description: Established in 1952, Ross-Simons brings jewelry classics into the modern era. An RS exclusive. Set your sights on these swoon-worthy multicolored earrings! Made in Italy, uniquely crafted Murano glass hearts beam with every color of the rainbow. Suspended from 18kt yellow gold over sterling silver drops, these earrings offer a sweet but vibrant element to your look. Hanging length is 1 3/8". Murano glass is unique and will vary. Earwire, Murano glass multicolored heart drop earrings.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ross-Simons Jewelry As a premier retail fine jeweler, we have consistently delivered exceptional quality, value and service for over 70 years. Our long-standing mission remains unchanged: to make elegant and beautiful jewelry affordable for you.

Ross-Simons: Our Brands We truly have something for everyone. Explore our family of brands and find the perfect jewelry to suit your style and budget. Ross-Simons: Your Story Every piece of jewelry tells a story. With so many fabulous styles at amazing prices, we’re excited to help you tell yours. Ross-Simons Jewelry Styling Tips Jewelry is about having fun! Create your look with classic pieces, on-trend styles, best-selling basics, traditional favorites, handmade exclusives and more. Ross-Simons: Our History For over 70 years, we’ve proudly sourced beautiful fine jewelry from around the globe and delivered it direct to your door.

Previous page Ross-Simons Jewelry From classic looks to the latest trends, we offer a vast selection of high-quality jewelry styles Bracelets Best-selling links, perfect-fit bolos, stack-ready bangles, gorgeous gemstone and diamond bracelets Earrings Explore our earring collection for hoops, drops, studs, chandeliers, climbers, threaders and more. Necklaces Pretty pendants, classic chains, slinky links, layerable styles. Rings Cocktail rings, fashion rings, eternity bands, stackable bands and more. Next page 1 Ross-Simons Jewelry 2 Bracelets 3 Earrings 4 Necklaces 5 Rings

Previous page Lab Grown Diamonds Our lab-grown diamonds have the same brilliance, hardness and durability as mined diamonds. Diamonds Our quality diamonds are expertly sourced to meet our exceptional standards. Gold We use only high-quality, real gold for our rich 14kt and 18kt gold fine jewelry designs. Gemstones Our gemstones are ethically mined and carefully selected for rarity, quality and natural beauty. Next page 1 Lab Grown Diamonds 2 Diamonds 3 Gold 4 Gemstones

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: goes so well with a set of bead necklace

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These look even prettier in real life. Just a perfect petite pop of color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love Ross Simons jewelry! I have several of their pieces & love them all. I am allergic to anything that isn’t real gold or silver so these are perfect since the base metal is 925 Silver. The blue murano glass earring are medium in size & hang beautifully w/French loop that just hooks into ear. Just a lovely set of earrings!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely but smaller and not as long
reviews.reviewText: These are a gift. I thought they’d be bigger and hang down longer. The glass is very pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for an event in which I’m wearing an A-line dress and a hairpiece/fascinator. They look fantastic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my sister law loves the earrimgs
reviews.reviewText: they are beautiful reminds me of trip to Italy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Do not order from this company. I did not receive my order! Ross-Simmons states they have fulfilled their responsibility. Now I am out the cost of these earrings!I would give them zero stars if that had been an option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect girl 👧 gift.
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift for my daughter in law who loved it.
